title: CscK metrics on rank one spherical Fano fourfolds
abstract:
This four-pages note is an invitation to explore explicit K-stability for
arbitrary K\"ahler classes of low dimension and low rank spherical varieties.
We apply our simple combinatorial criterion of K-stability of rank one
spherical varieties to the example of the blowup of the product of two copies
of the projective planes along the diagonal, and obtain strong indication that
it admits cscK metrics in every K\"ahler classes.
